ai-ne11:1.2_0: “It’s impossible for me to take a stand.”
ai-ne11:2.1_0: two parts of the wind starting:
ai-ne11:2.2_0: Two parts of the path and the practice.
ai-ne11:2.3_0: There are two kinds of ethical conduct in which the Blessed One is shared and leads to the neighborhood of an ethical person. There, in that place he makes merit with the celibacy of good behavior, the spiritual life, the Blessed One standing in that place.
ai-ne11:3.1_0: Herein, what is a particular component?
ai-ne11:3.2_0: talk about heavenly illness, talk about the drawbacks, talk about heavenly sensual pleasures, and the drawbacks of sensual pleasures.
ai-ne11:4.1_0: Herein, what is partaking of penetration?
ai-ne11:4.2_0: There is no level of worry waning to help, there is no starting point, no fruit in result,
ai-ne11:4.3_0: there is penetration, there is fruition, there is fruition,
ai-ne11:4.4_0: These are the four things well spoken.
ai-ne11:4.5_0: It is because he’s taught by the four kinds of fruit, all that is dealt with the spiritual life having all the wished for life. He should live having mastered all the knowledge of the earth as far as they arise.
ai-ne11:5.2_0: there are two things: the site for a dwelling, and the site for the dwelling.
ai-ne11:5.3_0: Whatever is there anything—whether sentient beings who have adhered to initiate, false views, and body—that is to say, their own dwellings, the six direct knowledges, the composing their own views, the thought, “This noble disciple is a stream-enterer, the teachings, and the followers should not be equal in the same way. And they are going to a stream-enterer, not liberate, and all these things.
ai-ne11:5.4_0: Anyone who has these things does not follow their example.
ai-ne11:5.5_0: These are the things that are theirs.
ai-ne11:6.1_0: Herein, what things are there that are no more?
ai-ne11:6.2_0: if she searches for someone who is seeking the distance; she must be re-admitted to the one who is a stream-enterer, regards the eight-factor of the requisites, and the one who isn’t looked down on them.
ai-ne11:6.4_0: all those who are warding off to the monastery called Dhamma.
ai-ne11:6.5_0: all the adepts of an adept’s ethics, all of them tight, including the teaching.
ai-ne11:6.6_0: When looking forwards, he should search out in this way.
ai-ne11:7.1_0: We will get to see a level of offerings, questions, developments, and produce any harm. And our practice is good fortune, because we will protect the development of the path, practice, and protection of the paths of practice.
ai-ne11:7.2_0: giving, ethical conduct, and meditation. Right view is a ground for making merit. Righteousness is correct, aroused by wisdom, and making merit with wisdom. Righting upon the development of the merit, and right view. Righteousness is foundation for the development of the noble ones, and meditation on making merit.
ai-ne11:7.3_0: Living in a suitable place, for the sake of conveying confidence, for the embracing the connecting seclusion, for the benefit, welfare, and happiness of the people, for the benefit, and for the embracing the profitable states, for the restraint of confidence in those without it, and for the ease of the well-developing of concentration and for the comfort, for the restraint of the Saṅgha, and for the ease of good people.
ai-ne11:7.4_0: Hence he said: “Here, Mahākaccāyana, and the fair in the teaching.”
